original_text: Then allotment was made to the people of Manasseh, for he was the firstborn of Joseph. To Machir the firstborn of Manasseh, the father of Gilead, were allotted Gilead and Bashan, because he was a man of war.
korean_text: 므낫세 지파를 위하여 제비 뽑은 것은 이러하니라 므낫세는 요셉의 장자였고 므낫세의 장자 마길은 길르앗의 아버지라 그는 용사였기 때문에 길르앗과 바산을 받았으므로

sentences.original_text: Then allotment was made to the people of Manasseh
for he was the firstborn of Joseph
To Machir the firstborn of Manasseh
because he was a man of war
